title: How do I MUTE ALL CHATS but NOT PINGS and EMOJIS?
body: /mute all muted everyone's ping, chats, and emojis after the new update. How do I mute just chat for everyone? Thanks.

replies.body: You dont, because it makes you a huge liability to your team. If you cant cope with competitive multiplayer games, find something more enjoyable instead of dragging people down with you.

Uh-huh... it's a rare occasion when my team has anything of value to say, but pings can still be useful. Hell even games where I don't mute everyone's chat often have either nobody saying anything or a flame war going on, and every piece of valuable information is communicated through pings anyway.

What's got you all bent out of shape? Someone kick your dog?

I dont like getting matched with deadweight players like you. Fortunately you all end up banned eventually or drop so low nobody has to deal with it anymore.

Although, if your teams cant communicate anyway, you are already so low i will never have to worry about encountering you or like minded individuals.

Yes, that's why I've solo climbed from Bronze 1 to Gold 4 and am now in Gold 3 promos, occasionally matching with / against Plat 4 players, in a single season: because I'm going to end up banned eventually or drop so low nobody has to deal with it anymore. 

You're right, how could I be so foolish as to mute people like you, it's turning out so poorly for me! I'm such a fool!

I had to go back 6 months to find a ranked game you played where you were the primary contributing factor to your team's victory. I'll leave it at that.

> I had to go back 6 months to find a ranked game you played where you were the primary contributing factor to your team's victory. I'll leave it at that.

Since i dont play ranked, i have no idea what you are looking at. Most likely just lying, like you are about your rank..

Explains why you have to mute all, though.

You are in no position to bring up other people's ranks.

The fact i dont play ranked really has no impact on the validity of any of this, what a random elitist thinks is incidentally worthless.

Yes, i just finished flex placements last night and finished close to the highest rank possible. I am sure you will someone spin that into "you deserve bronze because you cant even place higher in 10 games", because ranked elitists never understand the system. 

As for my own MMR, who knows, who cares? I was getting matched with everything from iron to plat, but nobody nearly as bad as actual iron players, or even silver.

You have several Ranked games spread out in your match history, amongst a sea of ARAM games, which I hear is the most toxic game mode in League, which would explain your attitude.

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/summoner/na/will+of+noxus

What sorcery is this? The internet is lying to us all!

That is your own match history. One can only assume you dont realize how urls work.
 
A week ago was the first time  i have touched ranked since the MMR reset, and actually, ARAM is quite chill. No bratty tryhards having preemptive meltdowns over absolutely nothing. You are hilariously more toxic than anything i encounter there.

Anyway, keep up with the empty ad hominem. I am sure you will find ways to ruin games and lose your account, even without chat.

Yes, that is my own match history. You said I was lying.. Not "probably" lying, or "maybe" lying, just flat out "lying."

Do you think you don't have a page just like that, which I looked at as a way to check whether or not you have any place in asserting what is and is not a valid approach to communication in ranked? It took me quite some time, as I said, to find a game where you were the primary factor that contributed to your team's victory, so I'm going out on a limb here and saying you have no idea what goes into winning a ranked match on summoner's rift, or what the atmosphere is like.

For the past month I've typed "/mute all" at the beginning of every game, and said nothing the entire match besides "glhf" and "ggwp," so I don't get how I'm more toxic than anything you encounter in your matches.

I'd like to remind you that you instigated this by starting off in an aggressive stance, making hard-line statements and assuming things about people you've never played with, and know nothing about.

Calling people "deadweight" saying others are "dragging you down" "can't cope with competitive multiplayer" and then you pull a 180 and call people who take the game seriously "bratty tryhards."

I'm starting to think you're trolling me.

I have been full muting everyone for years. No emotes, no pings, and no chat. I haven't even heard the in-game sound for years because I play with the sound off while I listen to music or podcasts. Judging by our ranks, you would be dragging me down.

I like to think about it like this...

If you want to be a higher rank than the rank you are in, you shouldn't EVER listen to the people who are stuck in the same rank as you unless you are around Master-Challenger tier. Otherwise, no random player will have any useful information for you. You dont need pings if you can look at the mini map and comfortably predict where enemies are and arent.
